markdownRemark.html: An excellent recent survey of the issues in language study in Renaissance Italy is Maurizio Campanelli, "Languages," in The Cambridge Companion to the Italian Renaissance, ed. Michael Wyatt, Cambridge University Press, 2014, 138-163. For Ciceronianisms, see esp. 149-152.
